channel.title: Saradomin ~ Find your way to Saradomin!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://saradomin.com/images/logo.png[/img] [color=#be9116]
[size=18pt]Journey to the world of Saradomin, a 317 RSPS that's packed with high quality content, focused around the rise of Saradomin. Our server combines the excitement of intense PVP combat, with flawless skilling and PvE that helps foster our player-driven economy.
At Saradomin, we strive to deliver unique, distinct, & diverse content that's exclusive to our server. We're constantly trying to improve and expand, and will never stop working to provide our members with content of the highest quality.
If you have been looking for these things, you've found the tip of the spear in RSPS excellence! [/size]
[spoiler=Staff Team][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=672004]Chris Ruzylo[/url] - Manager - CFO - Co-Owner [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=509768]Stuart Perera[/url] - Lead Developer - CEO - Co-Owner [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=447807] Nick (xxxtillyxxx)[/url] - Developer [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=468771]Arham 4[/url] - Developer Ryan - Web Developer [/spoiler] [spoiler=Updates]Will edit soon[/spoiler] [spoiler=Media]Will add much more soon. [img]http://puu.sh/989Nl/ea24664500.jpg][/img] [img]http://i1.minus.com/ibceDr1fIhey5r.PNG[/img][/spoiler]
[size=5]Current Estimated Release Date = June 15th[/size] [/center]

item.title: Saradomin ~ Find your way to Saradomin!
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:44, topic:543509”]Meh I would join but busy with work and stoof, plus I’ve not done any kind of programming in the last roughly 6 months and feel like I can’t write a loop. Nice project though.

Arham shut up and go do the twin towers in.

owait[/quote]

[quote=“Ruzylo, post:43, topic:543509”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=662388.msg4430327#msg4430327 date=1402969781]

I don’t even know what the Fuck the server looks like visually and its June 16th ffs.

Maybe cuz he kicked all his devs out on June 12th and then delayed everything.
[/quote]Maybe because I want devs that can focus only on one server without any distractions. Its honestly slightly annoying you posting it and saying it everywhere but have not even said a single word or talked to me yourself about it.[/quote]
Say that to the guy who did everything in your todo list.

Read full topic
